title: Includes the issuance and modification of zoning ordinances and regulations within the definition of the term "actions" for purposes of environmental quality review
summary: Includes the issuance and modification of zoning ordinances and regulations within the definition of the term "actions" for purposes of environmental quality review.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to including issuance of and modification of zoning ordinances and regulations within the definition of the term "actions" for purposes of environmental quality review
